name: A simple guide to Minecraft! (Pickaxe edition)
name_original: A simple guide to Minecraft! (Pickaxe edition)
description:
A simple guide to Minecraft! (Pickaxe edition) is a game developed by multiplegamesman. It was originally released in 2021.
A simple guide to Minecraft! (Pickaxe edition) is available on PC, macOS, Linux and Android. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
